<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Werebear](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3237)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Unwavering conviction fills a werebear during their transformations. This can drive them zealously into noble causes, but it can also make them ruthless, violent, and single-minded. Alliances can fall from a werebear's mind as their bestial temper overcomes them and their goal overwhelms all. As a result, werebears are loners, rarely even living together as families longer than necessary. As long as there is nothing around to threaten it or the natural area it protects (typically a forest), a werebear in its animal form is generally content to forage and sleep away the night.

</row>

[silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+7 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greataxe +13 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d12+7 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +13 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d12+7 piercing plus curse of the werebear

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 slashing

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=55)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Medium human with fist +13 for 1d4+7 bludgeoning, or grizzly bear with Speed 35 feet.

**Curse of the Werebear**  ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Saving Throw** DC 18 Fortitude

**Hunt Prey** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The werebear designates a single creature they can see and hear, or one they're [Tracking](/Actions.aspx?ID=2408), as their prey. The werebear gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when they [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=2301) their prey and to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) checks when they Track their prey. The first time the werebear hits the designated prey in a round, they deal an additional 1d8 precision damage. These effects last until the werebear uses Hunt Prey again.

**Mauler**   The werebear gains a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against creatures it has [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77).

**Moon Frenzy**  ([Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) 

</column>
